owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimActiveRewards(uint256,uint256).notice: Page through ACTIVE tokens to claim without looping all.

getPendingRewards(address).notice: Pending rewards for account across ACTIVE tokens only

getPendingRewardsFor(address,address[]).notice: Pending rewards for arbitrary tokens (active or retired).

reactivateRewardToken(address).notice: Reactivate a retired token (allows funding again; adds to ACTIVE set).

retireRewardToken(address).notice: Retire a token from the ACTIVE set (cannot receive new funding).         Still claimable individually via claimReward(token).

stake(uint256,address[]).notice: Stake and optionally sync selected retired tokens before changing balance.

unstake(uint256,address[]).notice: Unstake with optional retired-token sync before changing balance.
